author: {'steamid': '76561198028363630', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1422655890}
review:
Jeu plutôt amusant, les dialogues sont terriblement cyniques et drôles, à l'image du film qui est un de mes navets préféré. Malheureusement la simulation est assez mauvaise, comment les développeurs ont pu oublier d'inclure l'utilisation d'un joystick ? Le jeu est ensuite assez répétitif, et consiste quasi éxclusivement en des dogfight qui deviennent vite redondants, contre des ennemis pourtant assez correctement modélisés. 

Que les amateurs de simulations passent leurs chemins, mais ceux qui ont été conquis par le film auront le plaisir de retrouver une ignoble présidente des Etats Unis et d'autres personnages plus détestables les un que les autres, en même temps qu'ils pourront détruire des Zeppelins sur du Wagner.

Il ne coute pas grand chose, et est honnete pour quelques heures de détente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058854733', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1414188213}
review:
Hello ladies and gentlemen, Boys and girls are you looking for a patriotic nazi killing space warmachie game! WELL CONGRATULATIONS, Iron Sky :Invasion offers NONE of this (except for nazi killing). The graphics are well designed, the soundtrack is pretty cool and the cutscenes are decent, sure. But what ruined it for me was the actual gameplay itself...LIKE WTF! You just go around on long missions travelling into a dark abyss of space and then find out that your in the middle of no where. You'll find out you're using the fast travel option more frequently than you are playing the game.

The atmosphere in space really has no variety at all and feels really dull and empty.

This game is a piece of crap avoid it at all costs....

author: {'steamid': '76561198015133667', 'num_games_owned': 1292, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1479944653}

author: {'steamid': '76561198076577836', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1435680362}
review:
With the debut of Star Citizen, I was reminded of this game which is seriously kick ass (especially if you love sci-fi space stuff). Flying the space ship is intuitive and feels 'real', upgrade system is nice, killing stuff is nice, navigation is nice. Basically everything you could wish for gameplay-wise. 

HOWEVER, what this game lacks is the ability to play co-op, and more of an 'open galaxy' to explore... I wish it had more options to scavenge and travel. However this isn't what the game is 'about' so it is understandable, but disappointing. This game could've been so much better.

Also the story line is... there aren't any words for it really... the webcam conversations you have with the President and so forth are extremely cheesy and don't fit the atmosphere of the game at all. 

Overall... this is a decent game for fulfilling those star-fight cravings.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047761026', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1412564713}

author: {'steamid': '76561198000736687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 529, 'last_played': 1406997692}
review: Fun and silly game. If you liked the film like I did, you'll probably will ignore the potential problems of the game. For me those problems were that it feels very arcade: *bad* spacecraft vs spacecraft collision handling and weak AI. BUT, the shooting can be intensive, and the real-time management of ennemy waves is refreshing. The game may be a bit short, but hey, better a short fun game than a long boring one :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198071637684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 956, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 785, 'last_played': 1421589288}
review:
The game is not bad. It have good cinematics and good visuals.
But it seems like unfinished game. Its very short, very easy, very repetitive and have bug that makes some archivenns undetected. All you do is killing, killing and killing. After few hours it becomes boring.
Why not making some different type of misons like stealth, disguise, escort, more side missions, etc.
Why not make the game  have two endings? The player should chose if he want to continue fighing nazi or he will join them to stay with Renate. So half of the game could be totaly different. The game could have big potential but developers failed.

Two DLCs add some things that original game missing like ability to give orders to earth fleet or to fly nazi craft, but it can't save it.
I would not recomend this game unless it sold with discount (like when i bought it).
5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197970546102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4779, 'last_played': 1399864111}
review:
This game is lots of fun if you are in the mood for cheesy popcorn action.  This is not X3, but it is certainly not Galaga.  The story is fun in a MST3K kind of way, so entertaining that I had to head out to Netflix to watch the movie it based on.  The graphics are surprisingly good, the voice acting is horribly bad in a hilarious way, and the game is just plain fun.  Great value.

Final Opinion: B-Movie Goodness

author: {'steamid': '76561198052056947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 802, 'last_played': 1410826981}
review:
First off all the setting makes this game unique earth fighting nazi in space space zeppelins ufo's and spaceships not what you normaly expect of a spacegame.
the vids are pretty high quality and are fun to watch not to long like some and you can skip them if your on your second playtrough or first.
you got 2 main ships you can upgrade and sometimes you get special one to fly for duration of a mission.
At first I felt bit lost but restarted and found my way Its really fun to play.
not the best graphics or the best controlls in spaceflight games bit arcady feeling but It really didn't bother me.
If your a fan of the genre and want something else than shooting at alien races this is the game you seek.
bought me the 2 dlc in sales and never regretted buying it once its worth the price.

for people with 8.1pro or having problems with achievements not unlocking had problem too running game in 8.1 pro edition  did game setting compatibility to XP SP3 and running it as administrator just continued where I left off and prev missing achievements where filled in and got new achievements more over could finaly shut down game without forced shut down

author: {'steamid': '76561198100492367', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1410314836}
review: I gotta say I am impressed with this game. I found it more entertaining than I expected. Although I've only played a couple hours or maybe it wa 3...  this is a pretty fun space combat game. Reminds me of a couple very old PC DOS games (wing commander) I can't even remember the title. I just played a little of the extra DLC senarios (Second Fleet & Meteorblitzkreig) and they kicked my butt. Pretty challenging to stay alive to victory..oh well maybe another time. I especially like the ship explosions as it feels satisfying when one is destroyed. Although the character acting during the briefing videos is really a joke, (guess it is supose to be a bit  humerous) it still seems like a decent quality game. I loved the music too at the beginning, and during the game. For the sale price at under 4 bucks for the game and DLC's, how can you go wrong. If it was 10 or 15 bucks I'd still been happy. I give it 2 thumbs up!

author: {'steamid': '76561197979630750', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1410995200}
review:
i bougth this game expecting some kind of space-rts-civ-space ship game.
What I got was a love letter to Tie Fighter, a dash of Freespace, and WAY more political parody humor than I was expecting, somehow wrapped around with a lane-based style "tower" defense with spaceships and spontaneous objectives.


Surprisingly good, and the art style is.... special. War-blimps in space? Invading nazis on the moon? Perhaps the only decent movie-to-video game I've ever slightly enjoyed. Give it a shot if its on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020716038', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1498909891}
review:
Косимческая хрень смысл которой в том, что:
Бьешь фашиков, пока их корабли до Земли не долетели. Пока уничтожаешь партию - летит еще две. Если сбил - плюс реп. Не успел добить - минус весь реп. Сбил все три? Молодец - получи еще три.
Может дальше миссии и разнообразнее, но после пяти-шести однообразных заданий продолжать я не стала.
Судя по видеороликам в начале, до, и во время мисиий с командованием, я думала, что игра по типу моей любимой серии Red Alert, где перед каждой миссией тебе проводят видеобрифинг, и также раскрывается сюжет. Но не тут...
Единственный плюс - графон в космосе.
Игра явно на любителя, но я точно не в их числе.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140412745', 'num_games_owned': 505, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 643, 'last_played': 1654958592}
review:
Une evaluation rapide de ce jeu, comme il doit se jouer : rapidemment !

J'ai bien aimé le film, je me demande si je ne prefere pas le jeu. 
Les interventions des personnages secondaires sont tres droles, evidemment la presidente des U S A (meme si j ai un petit faible pour le president de l'Inde !) fait des apparitions remarquees.
Bref a jouer une fois de temps en temps pour un bon shoot spatial.
Ce qui est certain c'est que ce titre n est pas une arnaque, sans etre Le jeu du moment.

Chacune de mes parties est un bon moment assuré, mais bref, mais assuré, mais bref ! !

author: {'steamid': '76561198088363004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 1170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1170, 'last_played': 1407581191}
review:
Iron Sky: Invasion je vcelku vtipná hra, hlavně co se týče návaznosti na samotný film Iron Sky. Jste pilotem malého útočného plavidla a vašim úkolem je plnit přání americké prezidentky, rozkazy Jamese Washingtona (ano z modela udělali generála :) a pak dále plníte i další vedlejší mise, například pro rusáky či indy. Některé mise jsou opravdu vtipné, připomenu například misi, kterou vám zadá indský velvyslanec, aby jste se letěli podívat na určité místo, že se prý dočetl, že tam mají amíci natáčet nějaký film, když tam doletíte, zjistíte že jsou na míste jen nějaké pro sešrotování určené lodě a když se zeptáte totoho indského velvyslance, kde že se dozvěděl, že tam mají američani natáčet film, řekne vám, že si to přečetl na internetu :) Mise s ruským velvyslancem jsou taky vtipné, samotný Ivan vás bude manipulativně využívat pro své vlastní potřeby. Hlavně si u toho musí dát vždy panáka vodky, jinak by vás asi neukacal :) Budete mít za úkol probojovat se přes nácky až na Měsíc, kde se budete muset utkat ze samotným velitelem Kriegem a lodí Götterdämmerung. Hra samotná není až tak zajímavá, pozvyhuje ji zejména děj filmu a samotní herci, které z filmu znáte a zde hrají své postavy a zadávají vám mise. Sektáte se s většinou známých tváří, se samotnou americkou prezidentnkou, Jamesem Washingtonem i okouzlující Renatou Richterovou, kterou se budete snažit bez úspěchu většinu konverzace balit :) Hra se odehrává kolem Země až po Měsíc a bitek je zde opravdu hodně. Samotná hru bych ohodnotil hodnocením 6/10 a to zejména díky nevychatanému ovládání, což osobně považuji za základ dobré hry. Pokud se vám líbil film, tuto hru vám doporučím, pokud jste film neviděli nebo vás nezaujal, nejspíše vás hra neosloví, protože se dá říci, že je dnes spousta žánrových her, která jsou mnohem lepší.

The Second Fleet (DLC):
V tomto DLC budete mít na starosti postarat se o druhou flotilu náckovských sil, které nebyly zničeny během útoku na Götterdämmerung a jsou roztroušeny kolem Země a neustále na ní útočí. Vašim úkolem bude eliminovat pět výchozích pozit nepřítele, odkud pocházají vlny nácků, kteří útočí na Zemi. Samotné DLC hned na začátku upozorňuje, že si budete moci vybrat ze všech dostupných lodí, které spojenci mají, ale za celou hru se na žádné základně nezobrazila jediná lod, kterou bych mohl přepnout. A tak jsem toto DLC dohrál se základní lodí vylepšenou na maximum. V tomto DLC bohužel naprosto chybí to, co povznášeno samotnou základní hru a to jsou vstupní komentáře a videa se samotnými herci a tak budete poslouchat neustále ty stejné hlášky, které byly v samotné hře z interkomu. Náckové na Zemi útočí opravdu v hejnech a tak na vás bude neustále chrlit jedna věta, bitevní zprávy, a to musím říct v určitých chvílích už jde pěkně krkem. Po zničení všech plavidel není ani konečná animačka a tak máte pocit, že vám toto DLC nepřineslo vlastně vůbec nic, kromě pár hodin střelby. Hodnocení 3/10

Meteorblitzkrieg (DLC)
V tomto DLC si můžete zahrát za samotné nácky. Na toto DLC jsem byl docela zvědavý, ale to co se dělo během hry se mi vůbec nelíbilo. Vaším úkolem je obraňovat 3 Zeppeliny, kteří táhnout 3 asteroidy k Zemi. Zajímavý nápad, ale pak přichází to zpracování. Obrana trvá 20 minut, během těch 20 minut musíte v základní lodičce nácků s omezeným střelivem a bez štítů obraňovat 3 lodě proti houfům nepřátel, něktěrým později zaštítovaným ultra lodím, takže vás sundají vcelku rychle. Máte pouze omezený počet životů a tak si musíte dávat velký bacha, aby vás nesundali. Navíc před Zemí se postupně objevují obranné ruské satelity, které musíte také sestřelit. A tak když se vám povede přežít a nesestřelí vás, dojde vám munice, pro kterou musíte neustále někam odlétat, nemůžete si vylepšit loď a hejna lodí se na vás pořád valí. Obránit Zeppeliny až na místo určení není vůbec jednoduché a celé mi to přijde zbytečné komplikované. Toto DLC nemá taktéž žádné komentáře herců. Nápad pro DLC dobrý, ale zpracování poněkud kostrbaté. Hodnocení 2/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197972087529', 'num_games_owned': 808, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1406958896}
review:
I picked this up on a steam voucher, but upon spending a little time with it, I’ve certainly wasted more than the full price of many games far worse. 
If you liked "crimsons skies" or even the newish 'war thunder", as in simplistic mouse controlled flight combat sim style 3rd person gameplay, you will get into this as one of the in game quotes say "quicker than a French surrender".  (First person view is a little like wing commander)

Nothing deep here in either the story or gameplay, just a good fun shootem up with zeppelins, Nazis, and space pew pew with a near perfect crust of gaming pop culture, cheese, ham and sprinkles of racism.  

Summary: FUN! Casual gameplay

review: "Tell your friends why they should play this game"... They shouldn't. Difficulty ramped up insanely fast. FIghting an aircraft carrier solo in a bomber by mission 3. 5-10 shots to kill enemies and only 3 to kill you. Ship upgrades are insanely expensive right off the bat. Sluggish and poorly mapped controls. Definitely not worth the $20 price tag.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090244481', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1030, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1483561020}
review:
Do missions, shoot space nazis for scrap which you can sell to upgrade your ship to better shoot space nazis

Pros:
+ Love the modern spaceship design - these things look like real spaceships instead of the organic hippie crap typical of sci-fi
+ Game is casual and forgiving - it is arcadey and ships fly like airplanes, but its relaxing to play like COD campaign, ie. you don't need to be 100% to enjoy it. Its pretty easy to learn and ship controls aren't overly complicated
+ The graphics are good - the spaceships look pretty and overall gives the feel of a professional title
+ Who doesn't like humor - like the film, the game is satirical and funny, although don't expect the same quality of acting as the film

Cons:
- Mouse control is bad - it lacks the fluidity of games like freelancer and war thunder, so you won't get the same precision from the controls as you do from freelancer - maneuvering and aiming can be frustrating on occasion. Play the demo to see if you can cope with that.
- Lacks strafing and drifting - this along with the clunky mouse controls kinda makes me think that this aspect of gameplay was perhaps an afterthought. 
- Not very challenging. What the game lacks in difficulty it makes up for in bad controls
- The briefing videos are awkward and slow in which your character and whoever is briefing you seem to not be communicating in the same time frame - conversations like the ship designs are unorganic, and there's always that extra 2 seconds after each transmission in which the actor just stares at the camera waiting for someone to yell cut. Obviously whoever was in charge of editing the videos did not bother to cut out that bit
- The game doesn't save after docking to a space station, it only saves every time you warp into a location.
- No adjustable performance settings - not a big deal if you have an average rig but there is no way to perhaps lower the graphics in order to play the game on your haswell tablet - ironic considering this game is also a mobile game
- No first person view - again not a big deal but lacking first person makes targeting a bit difficult

Overall however the faults are mostly ignorable, and you can enjoy the game for its humorous missions, unique ship designs and arcadey experience, that is of course if you catch it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978534278', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 1084, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 870, 'last_played': 1539740563}
review:
If you love the movie and space shooters, and you don't mind games crashing while you try to exit them, or click on leaderboard related buttons, don't mind achievement systems not working properly, etc, then this game is for you!

Actually, that's not quite fair. The game is addictive, true to the movie and fun as hell. You get to fly several spacecraft that look like they could have existed today in an epic battle against the return of the Nazi threat in a game that has stunning graphics (though those get old real fast), includes subsystem targetting (a must that seem to appear more and more these days), multiple weapons and upgradable systems, and with the expansions allow you to play on your own with no story line and control allied fleets as well as play as Nazi in saucer that seems to fall apart at the first sign of trouble.

The biggest problems include crashes while trying to quit, leaderboard options that don't stop looking for a non-existant leaderboard and seemingly crash the game THAT way and buggy achievements (to say the least. Played out the game, which requires you to fly the canadian bomber: Canadian handshake achievement not ticked...). Add to that in-flight briefings that completely disrupt the gameplay (as funny as they may be) and WILL cause your near death experience you would do best to wait for discounts.

Still a recommendation is in order I think, judging from the time I've been playing it for the last 3 days ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198007550697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1405505899}
review:
В эту игру стоит играть как минимум ради главного меню и музыки) К управлению можно привыкнуть, хотя оно очень чувствительное. Купил, поиграл, не пожалел) Ну в какой ещё игре мы сможем погонять на  Дисколётах против Американских Разносчиков Демократии)
Из приятного - 
Главное меню!
Великолепная музыка и звуковые эффекты.
Если знаете Английский - оцените юмор в диалогах)
DLC Meteorblitzkrieg - купить сразу же - и начинать знакомство с игрой стоит имеено с него. После этого можете идти в компанию или 1-ый DLC.

Из неприятного - 
Не всякий осилит управление - это надо признать.
Битвы Однообразны - но это предсказуемо = в конце концов в подобной игре не может быть больше разнообразие - симулятор полётов в космосе как никак) 

Мой вердикт - 8\10.
Не идеал, но свои заманчивые нотки фана имеет  и не слабые) Поклонникам фильма одназначно покупать! Всем остальным - минимум ознакомиться!

author: {'steamid': '76561198120187818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1405399879}
review: I'm not sure what to think of this game at all. It's unclear to me whether or not the pilot was intended to be as obnoxious as he is, but he definitely irritates me. Space battles are confusing and I frequently get blown up for no apparent reason. However, you definitely get to shoot space nazis in space zepplins. I would definitely not buy this game for 20$, but on sale at 2$ might be ok. I honestly don't know.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978206623', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1507378911}
review: Any fans of the movie should not think twice about purchasing this game when it comes up on sale. A handful of the actors come back to reprise their role for the videos in this game. The dialogue is on the same par as the movie complete with all the banter. The controls work well with some clever ideas such as routing power to different systems at a press of a button. While the combat is not as in depth some other space games, I was surprised that you can target individual systems of the larger ships and are rewarded for doing this. The story of the game takes place right along side the game and incorporates the plot points. If you don't go into this game expecting a AAA title you will be happy with your purchase. The demo offered is a good taste of what to expect. My rating for this game would be 7 eval moon nazis out of 10. It does help that I am a huge B movie fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198096524393', 'num_games_owned': 827, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1488108078}
review:
Nie ma foto-realistycznej grafiki. Nie ma wybitnego udźwiękowienia. Nie jest szczególnie różnorodna, a fabuły nie można zaliczyć do wysokich lotów. Ale gra jest cholernie dobra, przyjemna, często budzi uśmiech na twarzy. I nie tylko uśmiech politowania, podczas "dialogów" z Renate, ale np. podczas otrzymywania rozkazów od Pani Prezydent Stanów Zjednoczonych.
Gameplay jest bardzo fajny, choć przyznaję - trudność jest albo żadna, albo strasznie denerwująca. Momentami floty nazistów są wszędzie, czasem nie ma ich w ogóle. Jest parę bugów - ale nie uniemożliwiają gry. Polecam, ale nie za pełną cenę - 3 Euro to absolutne maximum, jak dla mnie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061717113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1405097815}
review: I realise the short amount of time I've played this game for may devalue my opinion but I stopped playing this because it was excrutiating. The acted cut scenes are terribly acted the plot makes no coherent sense and the main charcter you play as is so annoying I just hope he dies in agonizing pain in the end. DO NOT PAY FULL PRICE FOR THIS. You will regret it, the ship is uncontollable, just a badly made game that many other game series have done better, Try the X series instead

author: {'steamid': '76561197995277365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1405117230}
review: Iron Sky was a cheesy movie, but was highly amusing. Iron Sky: Invasion.. cheesy game based off of cheesy movie, but still a goofy way to have some fun pewpewing invading moon nazis. Bought on sale.. game + DLC for inder $4. Worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010365048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1405109971}
review:
Śmieszna gierka.

Nie będę pisał o fabule - ta chyba występowała, ale była tak szczątkowa i nieciekawa, że można ją pominąć. Chyba była kontynuacją filmu, ale że go nie oglądałem, to i nie wiem

Latasz statkiem i strzelasz. Tyle. System sterowania jest dosyć dziwny, ale wygodny, dobrze przystosowany do klawiatury. Strzela się też całkiem wygodnie, są trzy rodzaje broni, stosowanej na pięciu bodaj rodzajach wrogów. 
Sami wrogoowie różnią się swoją charakterystyką i sposobem pokonania, ale szybko przestałem zwracać na to uwagę - po prostu rozwalałem najbliższego.
W grze występuje system ulepszania statku, kilka misji pobocznych.
Grafika jest zadziwiająco ładna, zadziwiająco ładne są też intro i outro (są też po prostu fajne, naprawdę świetne się je oglądało). 

Instrukcje do kolejnych misji, to filmiki z prawdziwymi aktorami. Mogą się podobać, choć według mnie były zbyt przerysowane i luzackie. Niestety ich wyświetlanie (zajmują tak z 1/3 ekranu, na samym środku) w trakcie gry, w środku akcji, gdy starasz się celować i sterować, jest całkowitą pomyłką. Nie można się skupić ani na nich, ani na grze. Na szczęście można je wyłączyć.

Po pewnym czasie gra robi się też monotonna. Misji jest chyba 8, wszystkie wyglądają z grubsza tak samo. Gdyby było ich więcej, to pewnie bym odpuścił. Ale te 8 misji, to jest akurat tyle ile można z przyjemnością przejść - zajmuje to ze 2 dni.

Podsumowując: jeśli chcecie polatać i postrzelać, to poczekajcie na promocję i kupcie za powiedzny 20 zł (a wcześniej sprawdźcie demo, które jest dość reprezentatywne). Ja kupiłem w promocji za 0,99 euro i byłem zadowolony. Za tę cenę warto, choćby aby obejżeć te dwie cutscenki.
Jeśli jednak oczekujecie czegoś więcej niż 2 dni niezobowiązującego strzelania, to lepiej nie kupujcie - tylko się rozczarujecie.

PS: Żeby mi ktoś nie zarzucał, że nie grałem, a oceniam - przeszedłem na offline i dlatego czas się nie wyświetla.
PSS: Nie sugerujcie się wymaganiami. Gra ruszyła na macbooku unibody z GeForce 320M (256 MB) i 3 GB RAM, więc ruszy pewnie na wszystkim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019033730', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1626105218}
review:
Don't expect deep and meaningful, don't expect gameplay along the likes of the X series or even Freelancer to be honest.

Expect a nice quick and simple arcade-style space shooter that's cool for killing a few hours, expect that sense of satisfaction when you figure out how to optimally kill each enemy (and ignore the loading menus telling you them for extra challenge)

Good game overall I recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045769930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1650175596}
review:
This game is simply outstanding for it's size, as the missions are HUGE, with Nazi UFOs zipping about while getting hit by multi-national teams of satellites-turned-gunships, whilst guarding a MUCH larger (SPACE) Zepplin which is in turn towing a FRIGGIN GIGANTIC asteroid, when, all of the sudden, a wild Mir Space Station appears with several fighters in tow.
Essentially, this game is a blast to play, with great cut-scenes reminiscent of the old-school Command & Conquer games where each one is live-action.

-------------------------In Depth Analysis-------------------

Tons of upgrades ingame, with a good amount of ships to use, each one bringing it's own distinct "flavor" into the battle.
Enemies are quite agile, and are not Dark-Souls hard, but they will punish you for really derping about, but there are no Insta-Kills to be seen.

The actors are quite funny, ( winks at Madam President ), and convey differing views and morals as to the Nazi Invaders, and are potrayed well thanks to great acting. Of note, the Nazi invaders DO speak full German, but there are subtitles to help those who do not speak German. 9/10

Gameplay Overall:  Fun, hectic, and full of accentuated international battle-chatter, with intense b***s-to-the-wall dogfighting. 10/10

Graphics/FX:  Great for a game of this size ( under 1 Gig even with all the DLC O.O  ) and the larger enemy Capital Ships take dynamic damage to engines, turrets, hangars, and, when aforementioned component(s) are eviscerated, leave behind nice sized chunks that will rip apart any unaware pilots, be it AI, or the more likely Player. 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197971657441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 557, 'last_played': 1405027205}
review:
Based on the movie Iron Sky, which is like Spaceballs + Mars Attacks + Team America + Moon Nazi UFOs + Julia Dietze, the game is pretty much only interesting if you have seen the movie and are kind of craving that little bit more.

Keeping in mind that I basically got this for $2 during a sale and the $2 was free from steam market stuff, it's not bad.  However, nothing about it is worth full price.

It's a fairly casual shooter with auto-aim and generic mission types.  It was designed to be a fully cross platform iOS/Android/PC release and it shows though it's quite acceptable graphically, being pulled up by the usage of assets from the movie such as the soundtrack, ship models, cinematics and live actors.

[list]
[*] It has live action mission briefings which are acceptably corny in that Westwood Studios way.

[*] Despite it having auto-aim, they manage to make the combat intense at times due to the number of enemies and incoming missiles you need to accelerate away from or dodge.

[*] It lets you redistribute energy to your shields, engines or weapons, which adds a nice layer to the combat.

[*] Collecting salvage in order to buy upgrades is a central aspect of the game and becomes more interesting as salvage only remains in space for a short time, so you often want to use your booster to get there faster.  This can make you give up shield or weapon energy to redistribute it to engines to collect salvage, increasing the risks in combat for a time.  A catchy mechanic.
[/list]

The keyboard/mouse controls are supposedly pretty bad, but I never tried them.  It plays ok with a 360 controller, though aiming is a little sensitive.

The Second Fleet DLC doesn't really add anything of value to the game, so there's no reason to get it.  Meteorblitzkrieg is 20 minutes long and not bad for the 74 cents it cost, so if you still want 20 minutes more then there it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010982138', 'num_games_owned': 1187, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 565, 'last_played': 1480685984}
review:
Чудесная игра в духе старой школы. Если смотрел фильм и понял юмор - бери смело, тут сей юмор так же наличиствует.
Юмор своебразный, равно как и в фильме, нежнее чем в Южном Парке, злее чем у Джона Стюарта.

Геймлей как в старые добрые времена, но без брезгливого отношения к новым технологиям.
Сюжет - то, что не рассказали/не показали в фильме.

Твёрдык 9/10 поставил бы игре и порекомендовал бы всем, кто соскучился по адекватному хардкору, видеовставкам в игре и занятному юморку.

ДЛЦ же не столь порадовали, но, со скидками можно и взять.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997281052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1407537033}
review:
Dot Point Review of "Iron Sky: Invasion"

Iron Sky: Invasion is a fully licensed product of the movie "Iron Sky."
The game is a 3rd person Space Combat Flight Simulator *cough* Elite Clone*cough*

1: More M.P.O.T.U.S. Palin, More UN bickering, etc, etc.
2: The First ship you get to fly in Combat is the Dundee
3: (2) is actually explained in the plot.
4: This game is graphically gorgeous and detailed, even on a lower spec system. 
5: O.M.G. I just did a Canyon Run along a Nazi Space Zepplin!!!!!
6: The game is currently on sale for about $2US on Steam. (90% off)
7: All the cut scenes have the original actors. See (1)
8: Space Ship and Space Station design true to the movie.
9: Some parts of the tutorial are not explained as well as they could be.
10: Some Parts of the game are not explained as well as they could be.

Final Review.

Read point 5, What else can I say.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986068024', 'num_games_owned': 828, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1380384967}

author: {'steamid': '76561197974952590', 'num_games_owned': 652, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 509, 'last_played': 1390305052}
review:
Ich hatte mir dieses Spiel mal im Angebot geholt. Ich muß sagen, das ich absolut nichts erwartet habe. Ein Spiel, das man mal anspielt und dann wieder weglegt. Aber ich wurde ABSOLUT Positiv überrascht! 
Zunächst einmal finde ich es toll, wenn in Videospielen echte Schauspieler in den Zwischensequenzen mitwirken. Ich glaube es sind sogar die Original-Schauspieler aus dem Film, kann ich aber nicht wirklich sagen. 

Das Spiel hat zwar englische Sprachausgabe, aber die deutschen sprechen Deutsch, was schon mächtig für Stimmung sorgt.. 

Das Spiel ist eigentlich nichts besonderes. Man fliegt herum, bekommt Aufträge, erledigt diese.. Mal feindliche Raumschiffe abschießen, mal Sateliten Scannen, mal Großraumkreuzer zerlegen. Gerade letzteres macht viel Spaß, da man die Dinger quasi "Abarbeiten" kann. Also erst die Geschütze, dann die Triebwerke usw. 

Das ganze kommt irgendwie sehr gut rüber, auch wenn es natürlich kein "Top-Titel" ist. Aber als Filmumsetzung habe ich schon bedeutend größere Gurken gesehen. Wenn man dies als ein Low-Budget Produkt ansieht und es auch als solches Versteht wird man seinen Spaß mit haben, zumal es hier wie damals in Wing Commander nur ums eine geht: Hinfliegen, zerstören, zurückfliegen. Kein Handel, kein Stundenlanges rumgefliege zu irgendwelchen Stationen. 
Die Raumschiffe sind dem Film entsprochen. Also keine High-Tec-Kampfflieger, sondern Raumsonden und eben die "Nazi-Schiffe". Das eigene Schiff kann zudem aufgerüstet werden, was noch mal für Motivation sorgt. 

Ich kann das Spiel auf jeden Fall empfehlen, vor allen Dingen für kleines Geld. Mir hat es wirklich Spaß gemacht. Der Umfang ist auch nicht zu groß, was bei der eigentlich fehlenden Abwechslung ebenfalls eher zu begrüssen ist. Die Story ist wie im Film sehr spassig angelegt, auch wenn es keine Schenkelklopfer sind, ist doch meistens eher amüsant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079169593', 'num_games_owned': 4638, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1581435769}
review:
Acabei de comprar em outra loja, a Steam colocou em promoção. Só para me sacanear, rsrsrs. Mas 1 real de diferença não vai matar ninguém :D 

Cara, somente recomendo este jogo para quem gostou do filme, mesmo podrinho estilo B, não deixa de ser engraçado e ter suas piadinhas infames. Eu recomendo. A jogabilidade lembra (eu disse LEMBRA) strikesuit zero e afins. Tem muito boas sacadas (que não posso contar porque senão perde a graça).  À medida que for jogando mais, atualizo o texto.

Repito. Só vale a pena se você gosta de simuladores espaciais com piadinhas infames tipo filme B.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042503270', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1404746747}
review: Managed to save an Indian music festival and favorite tv series whilst fending off space Nazi invasion, being commanded by Ma'am President Sarah Palin, flying an Australian spacecraft named Dundee and having the assist of USS George W. Bush XD I shit you not!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003378041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1614267960}
review:
Un jeu très sympa pour passer le temps,

Avec un humour omniprésent on pourrait le qualifier de "parodie".
Pour le scénario, il est assez simple les nazis de l'espace débarquent
et il faut les détruire, on ne cherche pas plus loin. Certain lien avec le film seront appréciables si on l'a vue.

Le gameplay est cool, le fait de pouvoir transférer l’énergie entre les différentes partis du vaisseau est sympa mais cela reste un shooter assez classique.

Le jeux n'est ni moche ni joli, les vaisseaux sont plutôt bien modélisés sans plus

Et enfin le GROS point fort de ce jeu c'est l'OST repris du film qui est juste magnifique et qui vous embarque dans cette espace en guerre avec de douce musique. C'est une pure merveille.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026049670', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 185, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1403904077}
review:
Die Story bei dem Spiel wird ziemlich schlecht rüber gebracht, wer den Film nicht kennt ist Ersteinmal verwirrt.
Die Steuerung ist gewöhnungsbedürftig und umständlich. Die Filmsequenzen sind öde...
Ich habe versucht es mir zu geben aber nach 61 Minuten war einfach die Luft raus.

Ich empfehle das Spiel nicht weiter. 
An dem Spiel haben höchstens Große Fans von Weltraum schlachten Spaß.

Ich gebe dem Spiel 2/10 Punkten. Die zwei Punkte sind für das waffensystem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040849994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1398570734}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024345661', 'num_games_owned': 1372, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 1288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1043, 'last_played': 1479136291}
review:
Podíval jsem se na film a druhý den rozehrál hru.

Není vyloženě špatná, ale je vidět, že vznikala jako doplněk a ve spěchu. Kreativnější základní mise, kterých je jenom pár doplňuje dost monotónní obsah - přiletíte někam, zlikvidujete malé nepřátele, zlikvidujete velké nepřátele, letíte jinam. Trošku vám to zpestřují filmečky s herci z filmu - alespoň Julii Dietze jako Renate Richter jsem vídal rád;-)

Samotné souboje jsou celkem OK, ale nic světoborného nebo zapamatovatelného - máte max. 3 zbraňové systémy a můžete přepínat energii mezi štíty, motory a zbraněmi. 

Celkově je to šedivý průměr, který se ale dá v klidu dohrát.

(Dodatek: Chtěl jsem si dodělat alespoň všechny achievementy... ale vzdal jsem to pro hromadu bugů při jejich odemykání při opětovném hraní.)

Za kolik stojí: 1€

author: {'steamid': '76561198042802777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1402868572}
review:
Please for the love of all things good,

DO NOT GET THIS GAME

What is bad about this game:

1) The controls; mouse to steer (it is impossible) the slightest movement and your spaceships doing loop da loops quicker than you can say loop da loop.

2) the cut scenes and dialog; i come back from a mission where you have to destroy THREE fleets of Nazi's which I do with surprising ease, and in comes a cut scene where the sodding commander is having lunch and asks if it was "alright"; I have just killed tens of Germans on a death defying mission where the odds were against me and you asking if it was "alright"!!! WTF.

3)  The stereotyping; throughout the game there is continuous stereotyping, calling the Australian spaceship f****** DUNDEE-O-1, Australians know other words than DUNDEE like IDIOT'S. and when you go to speak to the german woman who is helping you, what does she look like? oh yes.. like you average stereotype german (google images will give some indication).

4) not all German’s are peace-hating, beard wearing idiots who have stupid long names and talk about how there grandfathers would be proud; when the game tells you to try and negotiate with the German commander who’s called studflandasautotecnan poplestout Himmler (something like that) and is an angry old man with a white Hitler moustache in Nazi uniform. We can all guess what happens next..... HE SAYS NIEN, NIEN and NIEN again (basically). To be fair there would not be much of a game if he said yes, but still have some more surprise. 

What’s good about the game:

1) You can nick energy from different parts of the ship to supply different parts of the ship

2) You can delete it from your library

Conclusion
It is time i will never get back, so please DO NOT GET THIS GAME get KSP instead!

author: {'steamid': '76561197973280556', 'num_games_owned': 992, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1403224426}
review: Gran juego de naves espaciales, basado en la peli Iron Sky, y con colaboraciones de actores de esta misma. Iron sky nos ofrece una gran jugabilidad y crea esa atmosfera que nos creeremos estar de verdad en el espacio. Como no, el toque de humor siempre esta presente, al igual que en la pelicula. Como ya he dicho, muy facil de jugar, aunque hay que aostumbrase al pilotaje en el espacio, pero no te llevara ni 5 minutos en conseguirlo. Si buscas algo en plan naves espaciales, lo recomiendo encarecidamente, sencillo y divertido!

author: {'steamid': '76561197969331425', 'num_games_owned': 1305, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1402278865}

author: {'steamid': '76561198003213131', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 591, 'playtime_forever': 1812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1545582076}
review:
Déception est mon premier mot.

le jeu s'annonce pas mal, des vidéo avec des vrais acteurs, un sous titrage fr pas trop mal, les graphismes sont pas vraiment moche ... mais les contrôles sont à chier !!!
on à l'impression d'avoir recouvert le tapis de souris avec de la mélasse !

parce que bon du dog fight avec des contrôles pareil c'est pas possible, pour réussir à m'en sortir j'utilisais le ship avec les missile parce que ça restait le plus simple.
et comme j'ai pas envie de finir le jeu avec qu'un seul ship  et que les contrôles sont tellement naze j'ai plus la motivation pour finir le jeu.

je ne suis pas allé plus loin que le chapitre 2, et je trouve que c'est déjà pas mal, je désinstallerai ce jeu sans état d'ame !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197977037232', 'num_games_owned': 1513, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1399065031}
review:
Quiero y no puedo

Iron Sky es un buen proyecto pero mal ejecutado, quizás tendría que ver la película para encontrarle "el punto" o que me termine de enganchar.
A mi modo de ver es una muy buena idea, un guión original y divertido, pero justamente por divertido se pasan y en mi opinión parece que hacen el ridículo.
Gráficos correctos, ni malos ni buenos.
Jugabilidad...que decir de un juego de combates entre cazas en el espacio que no admite Joystick. Además el sistema de juego en general no me ha terminado de convencer.
Nota: 4/10 <- Y estoy siendo generosete
-----------------------------PROS---------------------------------------
-Historia original
-Diseño de las naves
----------------------------CONTRAS-----------------------------------
-Precio excesivo
-No admite soporte para Joystick, sinceramente si pudiera jugar con Joystick este juego estaría bastante mejor, como el Freespace...

author: {'steamid': '76561198065973516', 'num_games_owned': 1323, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1400266789}
review:
Игра на любителя.
К плюсам можно отнести: хорошее музыкальное сопровождение, звуковые эффекты и графику. 
Нейтрально: американский юмор (действующие персонажи гипертрофированно тупые, эгоцентричные и алчные. Сфера интересов деньги, секс и т.п. Похоже, по задумке сценаристов всё это должно быть ооочень смешно и интересно игроку.)
Минусы: 
-Тупость игрового процесса – за свои действия игрок зарабатывает доллары, на них он усовершенствует свой корабль, который все равно через пару сюжетных заданий меняют на более мощный, как итог смысла в модификациях почти нет. Зачем вообще эта система с зарабатыванием долларов не понятно, может это тоже должно быть ооочень смешно?
-Отсутствием возможности сохранить игру, к сожалению, уже никого не удивишь, во многих современных играх есть только автосейв. Но в  Iron Sky Invasion, автосейв улыбает ещё сильнее, чем обычно. Поскольку в моём случае игра сохранилась за 2 секунды до уничтожения моего корабля, пройти сиё творение до конца, не вышло. Начинать заново как-то уже не хотелось...

author: {'steamid': '76561197967989461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1503106517}
review:
While Iron Sky: Invasion (and its add-ons) is not the end-all be-all of space fighter simulators, it probably doesn't have any right to be as good as it actually is, especially for a video game based on a movie. The whole of the game took a fair portion of the latter half of the film - basically the entire space fight and Earth fleet reinforcement segment - and stretched it out without making it boring. The tone of black comedy and "just run with it" silliness from the movie is preserved, from the mission briefings with Madame President Totally-Not-Sarah-Palin, to the political shenanigans of the various national representatives, to the over-the-top voice acting from the various pilots in the fleet.

The controls are keyboard-and-mouse, primarily mouse oriented. On screen contextual tips do show up from time to time, which can help if you go a long time between having to use a specific feature of the ship. The learning curve for controlling the ships is very short. There are some technical problems - while I haven't noticed any crashes or freezes, it doesn't like my graphics card and the mission briefing videos lag the entire game as often as not. They can be skipped with no penalty and watched later, it's just distracting.

Unfortunately, once the tutorial is over, the difficulty curve spikes pretty hard; it's all but impossible for a new player to know what to do and how to do it. There's a certain amount of flexibility - if a squadron of Nazi ships makes it to earth it just applies a penalty to reputation, which is a score by any other name - but there's no option to turn down or postpone side missions, they get added to your to-do list automatically when you head to a friendly station for resupply and repairs. When you're running all over near earth orbit trying to play space tag with the Fourth Reich, something's gotta give. That said, you can buy yourself time to fight the smaller fighters and do side missions by taking out the engines in the big ships, leaving them adrift - but the only mention of this strategy comes up once during the tutorial on sub-system targets. It's very easy to miss.

Having said all that, if you liked the movie, you'll probably like the game. And even if you didn't like the movie, you might still like the game. After all, it's a game that lets you fight Space Nazis. I'll repeat that: You get to fight Nazis. In Space. And who can honestly say they never wanted to do that?

author: {'steamid': '76561198061791603', 'num_games_owned': 286, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1399854678}
review:
The mouse is inverted by default, and you can't change that. That's a big issue for me.

Also, the cutscenes are boring and stupid. The acting is horrible, and they are not funny. The gameplay is not fun or "intense", it's just really boring. The only reason I decided to buy it was because I had a 90% off coupon, so I decided to try it. I obviously was not satisfied. I'm lucky I only wasted 2 bucks and not 20.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971269084', 'num_games_owned': 658, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 1083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 816, 'last_played': 1577456524}
review:
AUNTIE SARAH WANTS YOU!

She wants you to fight against the evil Nazis from the Dark Side of the Moon.
Question is: Do you have the guts to not only fight Haunebus and Zeppelins in Space, but also to help Madame President in her election campaign or give the Indian people their beloved music broadcast?

If you can answer with: YES, MA'AM! ... Or at least had some fun with the movie 'Iron Sky' then this is for you.

This game is a nice addition to the movie as it focus on the figth in space between earth and moon, with some cheesy characters giving you mainly weird missions (only in terms of reason ... the goal is mainly jsut to destroy or rescue something) to fullfill.

It has some nice gameplay elements like a more or less real time battlefield, the possibility to switch your ship at space stations during the missions and deciding which battle you like to join. The two available DLCs give you some real time strategy element and the opportunity to play as a Nazi pilot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028184893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1518230437}
review: I think this game gets overlooked as another quickly knocked off movie tie-in, when it is in fact a very competently put together arcade space shooter.  Gamepad required, definitely.  The FMV scenes are hokey but fit the tone of the film, I tend to skip them.  I like that the enemy armadas move on the game map in real time, meaning you have to make quick decisions about what to attack and when.  Diverting power to shields and weapons also makes the combat a bit more interesting.  Graphically the game is quite nice to look at, backgrounds rotate and scale really smoothly, reminding me of late 90s space shooters like like Colony Wars.  Recommended, esp. at a discount!

author: {'steamid': '76561198000713490', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1441317104}

author: {'steamid': '76561197998753817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1016, 'last_played': 1479658548}
review:
Worth buying with 90% discount coupon. Other than that the price is too big for this simple shoot em up in space game. It has nice graphics, but nothing spectacular. The humour and actors from the movie, but maybe too much humour (Madam President is annoying as hell :)). Nice acting, though all storyline is presented in a small video chat window at the top of the screen. It's ok though for a game costing a few bucks, not 20. One bad thing about dialogs is that they often run during the combat, so you can't really concentrate on them. And nazi general speaks German and there are only subtitles translating it. So you have to shoot enemies and read the text at the same time. Bad, bad design. Dialogs should be out of battles or battles should pause or something. Gameplay becomes repetitive fairly quickly, though sometimes you have to defend or capture something, but most of the time you have to blast enemies. There are several types of enemies, some are tougher. Some require to shoot at the right moment (like Zeppelins, you should shoot into opened docks, but they stay open for such a short time..). There is some strategy to the game, as you should first destroy all the smaller annoying ships, before going for the big ones. You should watch your shields and energy and transfer energy to shields, weapons or engine according to the situation. But if playing carefully you probably will never die. Even if you do, you will go back to the latest save (every major space jump creates auto save). You are also allowed to change ships sometimes and buy upgrades. Other ships are interesting and have different purposes, like Canadian bomber carrying nukes to destroy asteroids, but most of the time you will fly Dundee australian bomber. Another annoying part is that you have to gather salvages of the blasted enemies to sell them to buy upgrades. You blow the ship, you fly to collect the salvage and you do these hundreds of times.. Well, at least there is an achievement to collect 500 scraps and buy all the upgrades for a few ships. All achievements are rather easy (just don't forget to visit all the stations to get all the side missions), but one should try to get them on the first run collecting as many money, kills and salvages as possible, because trying to replay chapters after completing the game will make achievements glitch and not register.

All in all, i was pleased with the recreation of the atmosphere of the movie (music, characters, space combats). Last mission was too simple, short and a bit awkward (to fly inside the big ship). The ending was shallow. But it was fun, short game, which doesn't require much skill. For the price i got it i'm satisfyed, and maybe even try some of the DLCs. One of them let you fight for the Moon nazis, and another one even introduces RTS elements of commaning the fleet.

P.S. one can always try a demo to get an impression.

Update: don't buy DLCs, they are total bullshit..

review:
Picked this up in a bundle for $5. Its great but very short. DLC's are overpriced, so haven't bothered with them.

Flight is immersive and fluid

Good variety of ships, but only a select few are upgradable.

Small variety of enemy ships, just bigger.

Couldn't change FOV.

Other than that pretty good, if you can get it for next to nothing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006586699', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 602, 'last_played': 1392742511}
review: If your a fan of odd ball humer and like the idea of fighting or playing as a moon Nazi then you will enjoy this. The acting is good and the characters stay true to the film, only bad bit is it can become repetative. All the ships from the film are included (I love the British Spitfire) and the Nazi forces are reinforced with new ship types. I would advise getting the Meteorblitzkrieg DLC with the game and get the Second Fleet DLC after playing through the game once, as it realy changes the pace of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970531401', 'num_games_owned': 1611, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1478313904}
review:
Biff Benedict Pocoroba (born July 25, 1953 in Burbank, California) is a former Major League Baseball catcher, who also played a few games at third base. He was drafted by the Atlanta Braves in the 17th round of the 1971 amateur draft.

As a rookie, Pocoroba got attention during spring training in 1975 by throwing out 11 straight would-be base stealers. [1] He made his major-league baseball debut on April 25, 1975, as a defensive replacement in the Braves' 5–3 loss to the San Diego Padres at San Diego.

His best season was in 1977 when he achieved career-highs with 123 games, a Batting average of .290, 8 home runs, 24 doubles, and 44 runs batted in. In 1978, he made the National League All-Star team, finishing the season with a .242 batting average, 6 home runs, and 34 RBI in 92 games. A torn Rotator cuff injury slowed his career [2] and he played his last game on April 20, 1984, at the age of 30.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027085788', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1392226096}
review:
Acheté avec un bon -90%, ce jeu vous occupera... une partie de l'après-midi, et encore !

-Graphiquement pauvre à l'écran, le scénario est abominable. L'impression de vitesse est inexistente dû à l'absence de décors à défiler.
-Le hud est génant pour les communications avec des acteurs pas toujours au top de leur jeu.
-Gameplay : le plus gros problème avec IS:I c'est que vous allez toujours, faire, la même chose. Abbatre des OVNI, ramasser du butin, améliorer vaguement le votre...etc


Si vous aimez les clichés pro-américain, tuer de méchants nazi, les stéréotypes sur les politiciens et l'armée... vous serez servi.

review:
So this game is about as good as the moive that coined it.    0.02/10

-Go for a city walk down allyways and poke yourself with every random needle you see in the streets.
-Clean a toilet with only your tongue
-Kiss a poisonous Reptile
-Stab your right leg with a rusty fork. Do not get a tetnis shot.
-Play ET on the Atari

These activities may prove to be much more enjoyable, and at a lower cost.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032282158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 1024, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1478386921}
review:
J'avais bien aimé le film de série Z et je dois dire que le jeu est pas si mauvais comme j'ai pu le lire à plein d'endroit.
Oui c'est pas un jeu AAA malgré le prix... mais je m'y suis bien amusé car le pilotage est assez simpliste et qu'au final on a quand même quelques sensations agréables de "pilotage".
Le point faible résidant dans les succès qui semblent avoir de très très gros problèmes avec les 14 premiers qui se sont débloqué parfaitement ainsi que leurs avancés dans le tableau in game des succès mais ensuite le tableau c'est remis à zéro avec la disparition totale de tout mes succès...
Ensuite impossible d'avoir un seul succès pendant plus de 3 heures alors que j'ai descendu le Tannhäuser, le Walther, le Wolfram, 10 Hundig, amélioration Xerg, amélioration Dundee et d'autres succès.
Gros énnervement puis au succès ou je devrais recevoir le dernier vaisseau "Banzai" rien comme d'habitude donc je me remets à la station spatiale et la pop de plusieurs succès manquant mais pas tous (me manque le 10 Hundig entre autre) ainsi que retour de l'affichage des succès in game...
Bref c'est un merdier pas possible et à lire le forum je suis très loin d'être le seul à avoir eu ce genre de problème, certains n'arrivent plus du tout à débloquer de succès quand bien même ils reprennent une partie, une save ou réinstalle le toute...
Vraiment dommage car j'ai bien aimé tout le reste du jeu mais ces bugs sur les succès me gonflent.
Si vous l'avez pas acheté dans le bundle je vous le conseille mais uniquement si vous arrivez à mettre la main sur un coupon -90% pour éviter d'être trop déçu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079559505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1391613461}

review: Do yourself a huge favor, never buy this game. The actors are terrible, i only got 10 minutes into the game before i realized that it would be nothing better than a cheap game with nothing good about it. I couldn't find any tutorials, or controls, I didn't know what my missions were, the story line (if you could call it that) was obviously written by a two and a half year old blind child eating glue while hes doing it. Put in short, this game will do nothing more than dissapoint you if you buy it at full price. with a 90% off coupon, maybe, but i would still reccomend the binding of isaac for that cheap rather than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998195277', 'num_games_owned': 606, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1423386062}
review: Excellent space shooter with a twangy soundtrack (hats off to the twisty National Anthem twist).  If you liked Star Trek: Bridge Commander or even old school Wing Commander, this game is for you.  Imagine a very unserious battle game matching the quirkiness of Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3.  Good game for a good moderate price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064156757', 'num_games_owned': 3338, 'num_reviews': 380, 'playtime_forever': 17683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2263, 'last_played': 1670361053}
review:
In the near future, mankind faces the greatest threat to its posterity ever in recorded history: an invading Nazi horde, reborn in the depths of space! An armada of Fourth Reich ships, built in secret at a hidden base on the moon, descends upon the Earth to rain terror and destruction. 
But this is not done without resistance. A cadre of crack space pilots have stepped forth to defend Mother Earth from becoming the new Fatherland of this twisted regime. A lone pilot, entering the hangar to see three state-of-the-art, prototypes ships awaiting him, knows he is the only one who can save Planet Earth. It is up to him and his brothers in arms to ensure that humanity stays free of the yolk of Nazism for good and all... 

Set during the main conflict of the movie, “Iron Sky: Invasion” puts players in the cockpit of an advanced new starfighter, to test his or her might, flight and dogfighting skills against the forthcoming Blitzkrieg-on-high. The main objectives are to defend Earth and its space installations from enemy attacks, blast as many Nazi ships into oblivion as humanly possible, collect and skillfully manage necessary resources, and make it alive to the final confrontation… where the ultimate secret weapon of the Fourth Reich awaits those foolishly brave enough to take up the hammer and chisel of heroism and attempt to carve their names onto the tablets of history.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982837520', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1486545002}
review:
Despite all the bad reviews on Meta Critic and other platforms, I've got to say that I do like Iron Sky: Invasion.
I mean, the graphics are very well made, the small cutscene VMF's are of a very high quality and actually very entertaining.
The gameplay is just right; not too easy and not too hard.
There's even a bit of character development in the form of ship upgrades and the option to change the type of vessel.
The sound effects are of a very, really, very high quality.
The controls; basically just like with Freelancer. Mouse flight and keyboard system management. (Energy, weapons, etc.)

I give Iron Sky: Invasion thumbs up, because it IS a good game that's all about the space battles in the movie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055725979', 'num_games_owned': 1326, 'num_reviews': 262, 'playtime_forever': 2025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1122, 'last_played': 1483929160}
review:
Acción. Simulador de vuelo espacial

Dificultad...............4 // 10
Complegidad.........3 // 10
Factor suerte: 5% aprox.

Año 2080 aprox.
Los nazis tienen una base en la cara oculta de la Luna desde hace mucho tiempo. Allí producen potentes naves y desarrollan bélicos avances tecnologicos, con el fin de preparar la madre de todas las invasiones a la Tierra. 

El mapa de juego de la visión global y estrategica es en 2D(distancia y horizonte), y se ubica siempre entre el espacio entre la Luna y la Tierra. Las oleadas de invasiones partirán desde la Luna hasta la Tierra. Con el mapa de juego veremos con todo detalle la ubicacion y velocidad de estas flotas enemigas

Nosotros somos un piloto avezado de naves mono plazas de la flota espacial de USA. Después de demostrar nuestra valia en el campo de entrenamiento, seremos enviado a combatir contra los nazis en forma de apoyo a otras naves y con autonomia para decidir dnd y como luchar.

La estructura de la trama y combates se compone por objetivos de misión lineales por un lado, y por otro de una cierta libertad en donde combatir en las invasiones a gran escala.  Por otra parte existen tres ramas de propuestas en forma de misiones secundarias que van paralelas a la campaña. Las misiones serán ofrecidas por líderes neutrales en la guerra como Rusia e India, o por la mismisima presidenta de USA de un modo ''confidencial''. Esta libertad servirá principalmente para conseguir más chatarra con la que mejorar nuestra nave.

La puntuacion general de la campaña será el prestigio total al final del juego. Ganaremos prestigio cada vez que derribemos una nave o completemos una mision, y por contra perderemos prestigio si las flotas de naves invasoras llegan a la Tierra. El juego incorpora una pantalla de estadisticas sobre todas nuestras hazañas.

Simulador:
La simulacion de la nave se centra en pocas maniobras sencillas pero útiles: llega a ser un simulador divertido e inmersivo, con unas normas claras y bastante profundidad en las mismas. La nave se compone de 4 sistemas: armamento, escudos, potencia de la hyper velocidad y energia matriz. Armamento: llevamos un arma de energia precisa y rapida y misiles mas potentes pero lentos: Escudos: cada daño reduce el escudo, pero se recarga a una velocidad moderada con el tiempo y sin pausa. Hiper velocidad: tendremos un x7 en la velocidad estandar, con esta maniobra conseguiremos ventajas para escapar del acoso enemigo principalmente. Energia matriz: es una energia comun sin usar, servirá para administrarla en el sistema más necesitado. Cuando desviemos energia matriz a un sistema, trambien se desviará parte de los otros dos sistemas al sistema que nos interesa, esto quiere decir que al desviar energia, perderemos una parte equitativa de los tres sistemas a favor de su suma al sistema necesitado. Aqui se forma un triángulo entre los 3 sistemas bastante interesante y equilibrado en la jugabilidad, y es en lo que destaca el juego y puede presumir.
En los combates estaremos siempre en inferioridad numerica aunque a veces tendremos naves aliadas de la flota(que nunca mueren)
 

P...Trama y contexto subrrealista pero partiendo del realismo
P...Diseño de flotas y naves realista y algo extrafalario
P...Viajes espaciales automáticos realistas
P...Mapa de estado en 2D de la situación de la invasion
P+.Adiministración de la energia de la nave interesante y válido
P...Jugabilidad adeacuada
P...Dx10 y gráficos aceptables 
N...Punteria poco precisa con un unico tipo de daños
N...Colisiones entre naves vagas.
N...Sensación de poca calidad y de ser un juego limitado


Si hay ganas de jugar un simulador espacial y sin calentarse la cabeza, este podría ser una opcion cojonuda, te llevaras buena experiencia. Aunque lo considero demasiado caro para lo que ofrece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052305267', 'num_games_owned': 1110, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 815, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 815, 'last_played': 1386252252}
review:
I bought this game cause Steam gave me a -90% deal on it, only 4€, so why not I thought. The game is somewhat entertaining to play, and it works suprisingly well. I do have some issues with the bullets and where they hit or not, but that isn't really something of a problem until you are some meters away from something. 

The game started off refusing to start cause it was sure that Steam was not running, that I tried to launch the game from inside of Steam, was apparently not proof enough that Steam was running, so after restarting Steam, it launched nicely.

 As I play this game, I just keep wishing more and more that I could get an option to join the natzis and rather help them invade earth and kill off these blasted incompetent leaders that send me around on monday errands in space while treating me worse than dogsh-it, the natzis does at least acknowledge me and actually want me to join them, but for some reason, my character seems to enjoy being pushed around on petty errands and treated worse than sh-it.... this, combined with the fact that I learned that Steam had stoped giving me my achievements after the 5 first..... gave me a pretty bad taste in my mouth.

In light of me spending extra time in the game, doing everything to get the game 100% completed.... have made me change my mind about those 4€ it's not worth itand you shouldn't even consider buying it, if you do however, don't expect the world... it is what you would likely expect of a game about spaceships and moon natzis.

 Remember to skip every video there is in the game, watching them may get you into a loop where you have no choice but to go back to the start of a chapter to not lose the objective ( which is tedious at best ).

If you still want to buy this game, buy it when steam is having a -90% off sale, if not, you will get legally robbed. Personally if given the offer to buy the game for the first time again ( with the knowledge I currently have about the game ) I'd rather light up a fireplace if i was cold, or donate the money to charity I were warm.

( to set it into perspective how bad this game is, X Rebirth is giving me less issues than Iron Sky Invasion have, and X Rebirth is the abomination that killed off the entire community for the X Series, and I'd rather buy X Rebirth again if I had to choose between the two )

( and if anyone wonders, I kinda liked the movie, in a way that it was so horribly bad that it was entertaining to watch )

review: What a......  I couldn't stand playing for more than a few minutes.  The voice acting of your character and real life actors that you converse with is SO bad that it will make you laugh.  But, it's not worth buying to just have a few laughs at the poor scripted dialogue.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048446687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1569723658}
review: First off, I say watch the movie first before buying this and you would have to like the movie somewhat in order to like this (that's my opinion). Don't expect anything too serious though because it's about... well... Moon Nazis... Anyway I love the game even though it may be "repetitive" to some or not a big title game like shit CoD. I recommend the game if you want a decent action/shooter IN SPACEEEE...! P.S: I do believe that it is a bit expensive, I was able to get it because I randomely got a coupon for it when I created a badge for 90% off. So the total was $4.00. Also I do wish that it had multiplyer because I REALLY want to shoot friends in Walkyries. Or shoot them down with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561197973881924', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1478686666}
review: Before even looking at the screenshots or the video, please, [i]pretty please[/i] watch the movie "Iron Sky". It's a bland funny movie, you watch it once, laugh with all the weird comedy, and then return the movie back to the rental. Now, if you really loved the movie, the ships, the setting, the story plot? Then, and only then, consider getting this game. It's a generic (albeit well made) space simulator following the story of the movie. Not much more than that... Oh, and Renate Richter is there too.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974417407', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1384587564}
review:
I haven't played something like this in a long time.
It has the space sim controls of an arcade and the wonderfully awful corny/campy FMV acting reminiscent of Sewer Shark, Night Trap, and Ground Zero: Texas. 

Shooting down Nazis IN SPACE has never been so much fun, in fact I don't think I've ever shot down Nazis IN SPACE!!! Until now.

"Can I get an Amen" - Iron Sky: Invasion

The dialogue alone entertains.


Now I want to go see the movie :p on Netflix in Mystery Science Theater 3000 style.

Iron Sky: Invasion is worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087977466', 'num_games_owned': 796, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 152, 'last_played': 1380878259}
review:
Вы хотите сбивать нацистские дирижабли в космосе ради обеспеченя непрерывной трансляции индийского музыкального фестиваля? Тогда вам сюда! Рассовые стереотипы, научно недостоверная модель полета космических кораблейи многое другое в Iron Sky: Invasion.

А если серьезно, то сражения довольно веселые, система перераспределения энергии добавляет динамики. Графика тоже нормальная. Радуют модели космических станций, которые хотя бы немного напоминают реалистичные.

Если мне кто-нибудь объяснит, с каких пор МКС стала пунктом по приему космического лома и автомастерской, буду очень признателен.
